name: send
description: Send a email to a user.

to_email.description: The email address to send the email to.

login_email.description: The email address to login to the email server.

login_password.description: The password(POP3) to login to the email server.

name: send_list
description: Send a email to a list of users.

to_email_list.description: The email addresses to send the email to.

login_email.description: The email address to login to the email server.

login_password.description: The password(POP3) to login to the email server.

name: recieve_latest
description: Recieve the latest email from the email server.

login_email.description: The email address to login to the email server.

login_password.description: The password(POP3) to login to the email server.

name: recieve_id
description: Recieve the email with the given id from the email server.

id.description: The id of the email to recieve.

login_email.description: The email address to login to the email server.

login_password.description: The password(POP3) to login to the email server.

name: recieve_list
description: Recieve a list of emails from the email server.

subject.description: The subject of the email to recieve.

sender.description: The sender of the email to recieve.

login_email.description: The email address to login to the email server.

login_password.description: The password(POP3) to login to the email server.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
